title: Downtown, in front of The Husk, there's a parking meter, but about 3-4 feet before that meter is a No Parking sign. So can you park there or not?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2017/03/a-no-parking-sign-in-front-of-husk-in-downtown-wilmington-is-followed-by-a-parking-meter-can-you-park-there-or-not/
